name: A Glitch's Strength (Jam Edition)
description:
Small Game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. I was not able to finish the Game in the given time, but it's still fun enough to play.

The Game {

The world was peaceful until one of its inhabitants (you, the player) decided to glitch out. Ever since, the other squares of the world has begun a hunt for the glitch. Luckily, the glitch can glitch out and avoid being seen by the square's flashlight beams.

How to Play -

Avoid being seen by the flashlight beams for as long as possible.

  • Mouse click - shoots a projectile at Searchers, that will temporarily stall them. (Uses half the Glitch Bar.)
  • Space Bar - Glitches and speeds up, becoming invisible to flashlight beams. (Uses full Glitch Bar. )
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Moves player
  • Number 1 - Reset Highscore
